description:
Frido is a simple game for kids and adults inspired by the popular arcade games of the 2000s. The player will have to take control of a robot that has fallen into the past and do everything to help him return home. As the game progresses, you will need to collect parts and solve simple puzzles.

• Charming protagonist!
• Simplicity! 
• Nostalgia!
name: Frido
intro: Robot time traveler got into the past. To get out, he needs to get to the time machine by passing 10 exciting levels.
